thread.title: Eckhaus Latta’s New Ads Feature Real-Life Couples Having Actual Sex (NSFW)
thread.title_full: Eckhaus Latta’s New Ads Feature Real-Life Couples Having Actual Sex (NSFW)

author: Lia McGarrigle
title: Eckhaus Latta’s New Ads Feature Real-Life Couples Having Actual Sex (NSFW)
text:
Visit the original post to see all 6 images from this gallery. 
The phrase “sex sells” is a truism in all industries at this point, but recently, fashion has taken it to a new extreme.
In the last few seasons alone, we’ve seen Pornhub sponsor HBA’s provocative SS17 show, Grindr livestream J.W Anderson’s FW16 show, as well as Diesel posting ads on both of those platforms.
Eckhaus Latta SS17 Photography by Heji Shin View the campaign at eckhauslatta.com Photography @hejishin Art Direction @ericwrennoffice Styling #AvenaGallagher Casting @samuelmuglia Production @frankseidlitz 
A post shared by @eckhaus_latta on Mar 29, 2017 at 4:00pm PDT 

But all that pales in comparison to Eckhaus Latta’s new ad campaign. To show off its SS17 collection, the New York-based brand tapped Korean photographer Heji Shin to shoot real-life couples having actual sex. The campaign veers close to the edge of porn, but the explicit parts are blurred out.
As expected with Eckhaus Latta, known for its gender-fluid designs and street-cast models, the ads show a diverse range of couples engaged in different sex acts to show multiple ways of expressing love or lust.
In other fashion news, Palace’s third SS17 drop is coming today.
